#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
	int n,m,x,y;	
	cin>>n>>m;
	while(n!=0&&m!=0)
	{
		int c=0;
		while(n>0)
		{
			x=n%10;
			y=m%10;
			if((x+y)>=10)
			{
				c++;
			}
			n=n/10;
			m=m/10;
		}
		if(c==0)
		{
			cout<<"No carry operation."<<endl;
		}
		else if(c==1)
		{
			cout<<"1 carry operation."<<endl;
		}
		else
		{
			cout<<c<<" carry operations."<<endl;
		}
		cin>>n>>m;
	}
	return 0;
}
